Hydras/Perceptor:

"But she rather join to her old mates than follow the commands of 
old fasioned and insane bot"replied Hydras while he spat more fire 
against the bird and flew towards Tylrael while he avanced he sent 
the follow comlink to Perceptor "Capture this bot... and be ready to 
kill you-know-who if where necesary" and this other one to 
Maxima "Be ready my precious to support Perceptor if he need... 
while he needs your assistance cover me" and replied to Azure "If I 
saw you around this battle field... I will kill her and If I die in 
your hands, she will follow me... and Rodimus won't have a grave to  
where he could cry her "



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Tyrael dodged the shots by flying upward and he threw two feather
> shards at Maxima and two other at Hydras.
> 
> Tyrael: A leader needs vision of both means and goals. Hydras has
> fused Megatron's deceptiveness with Galvatron's insanity! He plays
> everyone for his own personal advancement. You seem bright; you'd 
do
> well to step out of the way... That's not what Alpha Trion has 
planned
> for you anyways, don't you think?
> 
> He grinned and waited for her reaction.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> > Maxima held her rifle & aimed it at Tyrael to cover Hydras. 
> > 
> > "He's more the Leader than you!" She boomed with pain in her 
voice.
> > 
> > Then shot a couple bolts at Tyrael.
